title: Keybase46
author: Keybase46
content: I have crypto I need mixing am giving out crypto at a discount I send you more money keep in mind that the money isn't clean but you send me money half or a third of what am offering you can use any escrow of your choice just let me know like I said you can use any escrow of your choice and you get to pick it let me know the money I am cleaning is not clean money keep in mind what I mean is it is not money the authorities should find you with if you have no problem with this let us do business I give up to $75k worth of crypto and I get $38k of your crypto for a verified member am willing to accept $19k for $75k am stressing this again you can use any escrow you want you get to choose the escrow so it gets done the way you want and everyone wins

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Use [banned mixer] and stop trying to scam forum members. Just go to the mixer provided above and mix your coin.Why did you edit this exact thread you created whitc your alt account (already tagged)? Moto9999
